definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: I heard that partial shipment wasnt permitted.
sentences.chinese: 我听说不允许分批装运。

sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by re-inspection.
sentences.chinese: 经再次检验发现贵方装运的货物重量短缺了。

sentences.english: We'd like to designate Shanghai as the loading port because it is the biggest.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望把上海定为装运港，因为它最大。

sentences.english: The machines were dismounted for shipping.
sentences.chinese: 这些机器被拆卸下来以便装运。

sentences.english: The costermonger are barrowing apples and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 小贩用手推车装运苹果和蔬菜。

sentences.english: We require an advance of 15% be remitted to us one month ahead of the shipment.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求15%的预付款于装运前一个月汇付至我方。

sentences.english: Please amend your L/C to allow partial shipment and transhipment.
sentences.chinese: 请修改你方信用证允许分批装运与转运。

sentences.english: The letter of guarantee should reach us two months before shipment is due, as stipulated in contract.
sentences.chinese: 担保函必须在合同规定的装运期前两个月到达我方。

sentences.english: In some European countries a huge amount of goods shipped between the inland waterway transport.
sentences.chinese: 在一些欧洲国家间装运巨量货物的内河运输。

sentences.english: The components and auxiliary materials, etc, supplied by party bare to be shipped from Japan to Henna.
sentences.chinese: 收乙方提供的元件和辅助材料等将从日本装运至河南。

sentences.english: Every morning, he used a lorry to carry the lumbers to the railway station.
sentences.chinese: 每天上午，他用一辆卡车装运木材去火车站。

sentences.english: You must seperate the cargoes according to their properties.
sentences.chinese: 你船装运白勺这批危险货物必须依照性质进行隔离。

sentences.english: These small boxes will pack well.
sentences.chinese: 这些小盒子装运很方便。

sentences.english: For example, the in-store shipping system could leverage the routing service.
sentences.chinese: 例如，内部的装运系统可以利用路由服务。

sentences.english: It makes no difference to us to change the loading port from Shantou to Zhuhai.
sentences.chinese: 将装运港由汕头改为珠海对我们来说问题不大。

definition: to load sth onto a ship etc
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
